name: Puffin
description: A small seabird with a bright orange beak and webbed feet. It appears as though dressed in black-and-white formals.\nThough puffins waddle awkwardly on land, once they take flight, the impressive strength in their sturdy wings comes into full display. Since moving into the Serenitea Pot, the puffins have enjoyed a far more leisurely lifestyle, so much so that its already plump form has grown even rounder...
